data.name: Lamia's Plan
data.detailed_description:
Recommended for You

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1782130/12_Red_Riding_Hood/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1043260/Gladiator_Guild_Manager/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1259140/Ashina_The_Red_Witch/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1510580/Toy_Tinker_Simulator


About the Game

About This Game

"Use your deduction talent to piece together the clues and rescue the village chief's daughter before it's too late."
In the fantasy RPG - "Lamia's Plan", you will play the role of the famous female hunter Zel. Duel with the notoriously sly monster, defeating it both mentally and physically.

System

This game feature multi endings.
There are more than one way to solve, interact with puzzles.
It's a casual puzzle game with cute anime style.
Simple to play.

Enable 18+ contents for Lamia's Plan with this DLC:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1674480/Lamias_Plan_NSFW_DLC/

You may also like these games:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255320/Strip_Card_Duel/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1670880/Devils_Gold/

data.short_description: A Lamia monster has kidnapped Pokato village chief's daughter into the forest. It's an emergency situation, Zel - a famous demon hunter has been invited over for help. A monster and a young girl in lonely forest... Will Zel able to save the girl in time?
data.supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or larger display
